thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 7 of 122
thread.title: Mary Sinclair

author: Mary Sinclair
title: Mary Sinclair
text:
I had excellent service from this company from start to finish. Mason and Adam, the two guys who dealt with my booking and subsequent queries were both very professional in their responses to me. I was very pleased with the price of the airfare and the service on Emirates, its a great air company in my opinion so i was glad DialAFlight could find me an affordable fare with them.
Both the guys also had a warm and friendly attitude towards me without being at all patronising, which gave me confidence that i had selected a really good company that knew what it was doing!
